ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/Aylur/astal
ns0:entry.ns0:content: Building blocks for creating custom desktop shells

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/elementary/granite
ns0:entry.ns0:content: Library that extends GTK with common widgets and utilities

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/frida/frida-core
ns0:entry.ns0:content: Frida core library intended for static linking into bindings

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/linuxmint/timeshift
ns0:entry.ns0:content: System restore tool for Linux. Creates filesystem snapshots using rsync+hardlinks, or BTRFS snapshots. Supports scheduled snapshots, multiple backup levels, and exclude filters. Snapshots can be restored while system is running or from Live CD/USB.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/phw/peek
ns0:entry.ns0:content: Simple animated GIF screen recorder with an easy to use interface
